title: Brushes not spinning on Hoover SteamVac?
description:
Hi William. We saw your review on our site. We want to get the brushes spinning properly again. We put together a quick video to help. Please let us know if this didn't fix your problem! -Felicia

April: You can find a service center near you here: www.ho
